thread.title: BlackBerry Has to Crack Android’s Code
thread.title_full: BlackBerry Has to Crack Android’s Code - WSJ

author: Dan Gallagher
title: BlackBerry Has to Crack Android’s Code
text:
Unlike the scene outside Apple stores Friday, fans no longer line up to buy BlackBerry smartphones. But the company can’t afford to ignore the business it once ruled.
That much was evident Friday when the company confirmed—after months of leaks—that it is building a handset to run on Google’s Android operating system. The device will feature... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
